work.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed complex application signatures for Bittorent and various VPN, VOIP and streaming media apps.
Designed in-memory caching for URL-CAT component, enhanced message passing between two threads.
Identified deprecated app signatures and refactored classifiers to achieve overall performance gain of 5%.
Improved productivity of team 3 times by developing a signature generation tool from captures using NLP.

work.title: Software Devlopment Intern
description: Optimized the user DB Queries with better indexing practices and attained a performance gain of 8%.
Refactored Invoice generation component on React-SpringBoot, authored automation with 80% coverage.

projects.title: Indoor Potential Cluster Tracker, COVID-19
description: Devised an application that can predict the spread of COVID-19 infections in an indoor environment.
Designed WiFi-based indoor positioning system to track individualâ€™s activity using Decision Tree regressor.
App keeps track of distancing violations, notifies individual upon risk detection-primary contact to infected.

projects.title: Channel access schemes for IEEE 802.11ah
description: Presented comparative study of Traditional DCF, 802.11e EDCA based Channel Access Scheme using HMM.
Proposed station grouping scheme for RAW channels using Hierarchical Clustering and Neural Networks.
The proposed model wrt uniform grouping attained fairness ratio of 0.945, 23% gain in norm throughput.

projects.title: Seven Stage Speech Classifier using Neural Networks
description: A dataset with 1M entries was created from TIMIT and NOIZEUS data, an accuracy of 94.5% was achieved.
